text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْهُدَىٰ وَأَوْرَثْنَا بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ

translation.en.sahih: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami berikan petunjuk kepada Musa; dan Kami wariskan Taurat kepada Bani Israil,
